mean_cn: adj. 坦白的，无偏见的，公正的，率直的
mean_en: expressing opinions and feelings in an honest and sincere way
word_etyma: cand白 + id形容词后缀 → candid 坦白的
short_phrase: his candid opinion of the object
sentence: She was very candid with her friends; she directly expressed her opinion.
sentence_trans: 她对自己的朋友很率直，有什么话都会直说。
